Their voile moondust grey panel is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, panelblinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this panel blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind.
